name: azure-nodejs
description: Azure Functions sample for the Serverless framework

scripts.compile: npx tsc && sed -i.bak -re 's/import \* as (.*) from "(.*)"/const \1 = require("\2")/g' src/handler.js
scripts.deploy: npm run compile && date +'%nvar BUILD_TIME = "%c"' | tee -a src/handler.js && chamber exec azure/test1 -- npx serverless deploy
scripts.start: npm run compile && RUN_CONSOLE=1 chamber exec azure/test1 -- node src/handler
